task.title: Uploading a CSAR package to CBAM

taskbody.context:
Overview
This procedure provides instructions on how to upload a CSAR package to CBAM.
For more information on CBAM, see CloudBand Application Manager (CBAM) documentation in the Nokia Discovery Center by going to https://doc.networks.nokia.com
Before you begin:
Before beginning this procedure, ensure that you are logged in to the CBAM GUI.To upload the CSAR package to CBAM:

step.cmd: In the CBAM GUI, click the options button with three horizontal lines and then select Catalog. The Catalog pane appears.

info.note: Before executing the next step, you must modify the value of VNF package zip file. See for more details.

step.cmd: In the Catalog pane, click the Upload VNF Package represented by the plus icon. The Upload VNF Package window appears.
In the Upload VNF Package window, click browse and select the appropriate CSAR package, or use Drag and drop option to add the CSAR package to the CBAM catalog.

note.p: The CSAR package is ready for upload when the following occurs in the Upload VNF Package window:

li.p: The name of the CSAR package appears in the File name area.
In the Status field, the message Ready for upload appears.

info.p: When the CSAR package is ready for upload, click Upload.
If the operation succeeds, the CSAR package appears in the Catalog pane. If the operation fails, an error message appears in the GUI.

step.cmd: If the operation succeeds, verify that the CSAR package is listed in the CBAM catalog.

If the operation fails, depending on the cause of failure, you might need to delete the CSAR package using the procedure . For more information on what to do if this operation fails, see CloudBand Application Manager (CBAM) documentation.
